sentences.sContent: Eddy diffusion is apparent in the dissipation of smoke from a smokestack.
sentences.sContent_eng: Eddy diffusion is apparent in the dissipation of smoke from a smokestack.
sentences.sCn: 从烟囱里冒出的烟消散中我们可以明显地看到涡流扩散。

remMethod.val: smoke(烟) + stack(排烟道) → 烟囱

trans.tranOther: a tall  chimney  at a factory or on a ship
